titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Richmond John Rathbone Collection of Rare Maps, 1550-1798
titlestmt.author: Inventory prepared by Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

publicationstmt.publisher: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Emma Gronbeck, September 2024.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Richmond John Rathbone Collection of Rare Maps

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries

did.abstract: Collection of maps, atlas pages, and documents depicting the Western Hemisphere, globe, and regions of North America from the 16th to 18th centuries. Also included is a military commission for Daniel Rathbun, Jr., signed by New York governor John Jay in 1798.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Collection of maps, atlas pages, and documents, depicting the Western Hemisphere, globe, and regions of North America from the 16th to 18th centuries. Includes four maps drawn by Samuel Lewis (ca. 1854-1922) from "General Atlas of Guthrie's Geography Improved" by Matthew Carey. Also included is a military commission for Daniel Rathbun, Jr., signed by New York governor John Jay in 1798.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is organized into two groupings by material type and sub-arranged alphabetically by creator or title.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research according to the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library without any additional restrictions.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Permission to quote (publish) from unpublished or previously published material must be obtained as described in the regulations of the Vassar College Archives and Special Collections Library .

p.archref: Breed Collection of Maps, Documents, and Prints
Edward Lasker Collection of Atlases and Maps

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of Mary Rathbone Acker, 2004 and 2005. [M2004-010 and M2005-003]

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Richmond John Rathbone Collection of Rare Maps, Archives and Special Collections Library, Vassar College Libraries.
